title: South African Airways Vacations® Offers Free Car Rental On Its "Garden Route Splendor" Self-Drive Package
text:
South African Airways Vacations
Explore the Cape Garden Route at your own pace and save $300 per person on the air-inclusive, 11-night package, now at $3,399* per person (restrictions apply)
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. , Aug. 31, South African Airways Vacations® (SAA Vacations®) is offering a free car rental, GPS on its "Garden Route Splendor Luxury Self-Drive" package. This special promotion represents a saving of $300 per person and reduces the package's price to $3,399* per person (restrictions apply).
The "Garden Route Splendor Luxury Self-Drive" is a tour of the most beautiful towns in South Africa and a luxurious experience of the picturesque Cape Garden Route. The air-inclusive package includes 11 nights in renowned Five Star properties: The Alphen Boutique Hotel, The Mosaic Private Sanctuary Lagoon Lodge, The Turbine Boutique Hotel and Spa, Kichaka Game Lodge and The Miarestate Hotel and Spa. It also includes six lunches and six dinners.
After exploring Cape Town and the wine region at your own pace, start driving along the False Bay coast. The spectacular scenery is made up of charming seaside villages, farms, rivers, coves and valleys. During the right season the whales can be seen cruising and wallowing in the coastal waters. Because a South African adventure would not be complete without a Big Five experience, this tour will also take you on a safari and a two-night stay at Kichaka Game Lodge, on a fully-inclusive basis.
"Self-driving along the Garden Route of South Africa gives travellers the freedom and flexibility to truly get the most out of their vacation," said Terry von Guilleaume , President of South African Airways Vacations®. "This is a classic bucket-list road-trip and we are offering free car-rental so now is the best time to experience it!"
Travelers are encouraged to contact SAA Vacations' ® Africa specialists to take advantage of the "Garden Route Splendor" package, at 1-855-FLY-SAAV or their professional travel consultant. For more information about SAA Vacations® 2015 Collection visit: www.flysaavacations.com .
About South African Airways Vacations ®
A division of South African Airways (SAA), the national airline of South Africa and Africa's most awarded airline, SAA Vacations ® is highly regarded for its wide array of affordable luxury packages to Africa and uses SAA's extensive route network to create packages for travel throughout South Africa , Botswana , Victoria Falls , Namibia , Mozambique , Zambia , Zimbabwe , and East Africa . The program is managed and fulfilled by Destination Southern Africa (DSA), which was founded in 2001 and offers an extensive portfolio of tour programs with a variety of hotels, game lodges and safari companies throughout Southern Africa. DSA was one of three tour operators in the U.S. that was officially appointed by MATCH to develop and sell travel packages for soccer fans visiting South Africa for the FIFA 2010 World Cup, making it a partner with extensive knowledge and know-how in planning the perfect African vacation.
*Terms & Conditions
Price is per person based on double occupancy. Valid as of August 20, 2015 for departures from New York (JFK) between August 20 - September 30, 2015 and April 01 - May 31, 2016 and also August 20 - September 30, 2016 with the same itinerary available at higher prices during other travel periods. Other departure points and domestic flights within the U.S. can be booked. Price for other departure cities and/or travel dates may vary. Subject to availability and currency exchange rate fluctuations. Prices are valid for new bookings only, are not retroactive and may change without notice. Package includes all government and airline imposed taxes and fees. Baggage and optional service fees, cancellation charges and other restrictions may apply. Free Car Rental excludes contract fee, fuel and one way drop off fee.
